## AppModule.deployBundleModule() method

Deploys a collection module.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deployBundleModule(metadata: BundleModuleMetadata): Promise<CollectionModule>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  metadata | [BundleModuleMetadata](./sdk.bundlemodulemetadata.md) | Metadata about the module. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[CollectionModule](./sdk.collectionmodule.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise with the newly created module.
